# wtf-timeline-block

A timeline block.

- Used together with [`wtf-timeline` component](../wtf-timeline).
- See [timeline example](../../examples/timeline.html) for usage.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute              | Description              | Type     | Default     |
| -------------------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `colorContent`       | `color-content`        | Content color            | `string` | `undefined` |
| `colorContentBg`     | `color-content-bg`     | Content background color | `string` | `undefined` |
| `colorContentShadow` | `color-content-shadow` | Content shadow color     | `string` | `undefined` |
| `colorDate`          | `color-date`           | Date color               | `string` | `undefined` |
| `colorIconBg`        | `color-icon-bg`        | Icon background color    | `string` | `undefined` |
| `colorIconShadow`    | `color-icon-shadow`    | Icon shadow color        | `string` | `undefined` |
| `date`               | `date`                 | Date                     | `string` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                     | Description                     |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------------- |
| `--color-content-bg`     | Color of the content background |
| `--color-content-shadow` | Color of the content shadow     |
| `--color-date`           | Color of the date               |
| `--color-icon-bg`        | Color of the icon background    |
| `--color-icon-shadow`    | Color of the icon shadow        |
| `--radius-content`       | Radius of content               |
